sellerProfiles.name: Clara Mendes (Ceramics Artist)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: Passionate about ceramics for over a decade. My work seeks harmony between rustic and elegant, transforming clay into functional art. Every piece by Clay & Glaze carries a unique story and soul.

sellerProfiles.name: Victor Glass (Blown Glass Artist)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: Master in the art of blown glass. I create sculptures and objects that capture light in a singular way. Ethereal Glassworks is where the magic of fire meets the transparency of matter, resulting in truly ethereal pieces.

sellerProfiles.name: Sofia Taylor (Jewelry Designer)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: I design and handcraft intricate beaded jewelry, drawing inspiration from nature and global cultures. Each Glimmerstone piece is a vibrant expression of color and individuality.

sellerProfiles.name: Marcus Reed (Leather Craftsman)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: Dedicated to creating timeless leather goods. I use traditional methods and high-quality full-grain leather for accessories that are made to last and tell a story through their patina.

sellerProfiles.name: Lena Woods (Wood Carver)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: My focus is on hand-carved wood sculptures and functional objects. I highlight the natural grain and forms of the wood, bringing a piece of the forest into modern living.

sellerProfiles.name: Anna Knot (Knitwear Specialist)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: Creating cozy and colorful hand-knitted items using only the finest natural wools. Each accessory from Wool & Whimsy is designed for comfort, warmth, and a touch of playful charm.

sellerProfiles.name: Elias Vance (Printmaker)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: As a printmaker and illustrator, I specialize in unique custom stationery, journals, and fine art prints. I celebrate the tactile beauty of paper and the lasting impression of ink.

sellerProfiles.name: Maya Loom (Textile Artist)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: Specializing in bespoke embroidery and intricate textile art. I transform simple threads into complex, vibrant patterns, adding personalized elegance to home decor.

sellerProfiles.name: Ben Rattan (Wicker Weaver)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: I craft durable and elegant furniture and decor from natural fibers. My work honors traditional weaving methods, blending rustic charm with modern functionality.

sellerProfiles.name: Ivan Steel (Blacksmith)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: A modern blacksmith focused on forging functional and decorative metal pieces. I combine raw iron and steel with refined artistic design, celebrating the strength of the material.

sellerProfiles.name: Alex Fine (Painter)
sellerProfiles.aboutMe: An artist dedicated to oil and watercolor painting. My work captures the emotional depth of landscapes and portraits, turning plain canvas into expressive, visual stories.

collections.name: Clay & Glaze
collections.story: Our Clay & Glaze studio is dedicated to the art of pottery, where each piece is handcrafted from natural clay and finished with unique, durable glazes. We believe in creating functional art that brings warmth to your home.

collections.name: Ethereal Glassworks
collections.story: At Ethereal Glassworks, we capture light and color in every piece of blown glass. Our artisans use traditional techniques to create whimsical ornaments and sculptures that look like they belong in a fairytale.

collections.name: Glimmerstone Jewels
collections.story: Glimmerstone Jewels specializes in handmade, beaded jewelry. Our designers draw inspiration from vibrant cultures and the natural world, selecting each bead for its unique shape, color, and story.

collections.name: Heritage Leathers
collections.story: Heritage Leathers Co. is committed to the timeless craft of leatherwork. We use full-grain leather to create wallets, bags, and accessories that are designed to last a lifetime and develop a beautiful patina over time.

collections.name: Timbercraft Artisans
collections.story: Timbercraft Artisans transforms raw wood into elegant, hand-carved sculptures. Each piece celebrates the natural grain and beauty of the wood, with a focus on intricate detail and organic, flowing forms.

collections.name: Wool & Whimsy
collections.story: Wool & Whimsy crafts cozy, hand-knitted accessories. We use only the finest natural wool to create warm, soft pieces that are as beautiful as they are comfortable, perfect for cold weather.

collections.name: Paper & Ink
collections.story: Paper & Ink is a collective of illustrators and printmakers. We specialize in creating custom stationery, hand-bound journals, and limited-edition prints that celebrate the art of writing and design.

collections.name: Stitch & Thread
collections.story: The Stitch & Thread workshop focuses on bespoke embroidery and textile art. Every piece is a unique tapestry of intricate patterns and vibrant colors, bringing a touch of personalized elegance to any space.

collections.name: Wicker & Weave
collections.story: Wicker & Weave creates beautiful, handcrafted furniture and decor from natural fibers. Our artisans use traditional weaving techniques to produce durable and elegant pieces that blend seamlessly with any rustic or modern design.

collections.name: Forged Metals
collections.story: Forged Metals is a studio dedicated to the ancient craft of blacksmithing. Our artisans forge unique iron and steel sculptures, tools, and home goods that combine raw strength with refined artistry.

collections.name: Canvas & Brush
collections.story: Canvas & Brush is an artist-led studio where every painting tells a story. We specialize in a variety of mediums, from vivid oil paintings to subtle watercolors, capturing landscapes and portraits with deep emotion.
